name: Froggy
description:
"Froggy" is a gem collecting puzzle game about little (but smart) frog who is going to beat through many unique levels. It's a nice one for all puzzle lovers!

Game Features:
  • Play as a handsome froggy
  • Collect beautiful gemstones to unlock portals
  • Build tiles to build your own way
  • Beat 20 unique, hand made levels
  • Steam Achievements support
  • Some levels are very difficult - use your brain!
  • Simple but cute pixelart style

We hope this game will be a real challenge for everyone who dares to try!
